title: About Me

content: Eid Alkhaldi, Ph.D. AI & Data Science Expert | Researcher | Consultant
title: About Me

content: Introduction I am Eid Alkhaldi, a Certified Professional Data Scientist with a Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering from the University of Toledo, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Autonomous Systems. Over the past 8 years, I have been involved in groundbreaking research and the development of AI solutions for industry and academia. My journey covers a wide range of applications in image processing, AI-powered solutions, and autonomous systems. I am passionate about applying AI to solve real-world challenges, especially in healthcare and autonomous driving.
title: About Me

content: Education Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering University of Toledo Specialization: Medical Image Processing, AI, and Deep Learning Advisor: Dr. Ezzatollah Salari M.S. in Electrical Engineering University of Toledo B.S. in Electrical Engineering Oklahoma State University
